desc: Unicode
---


Start of string
.
💩 test __1__
.
<p><img class="emoji" draggable="false" alt="💩" src="/img/36x36/1f4a9.png"> test <strong>1</strong></p>
.


End of string
.
test __2__ 💩
.
<p>test <strong>2</strong> <img class="emoji" draggable="false" alt="💩" src="/img/36x36/1f4a9.png"></p>
.


Middle & multiple
.
aaa 💩 bbb 😀 ccc 🐈 ddd
.
<p>aaa <img class="emoji" draggable="false" alt="💩" src="/img/36x36/1f4a9.png"> bbb <img class="emoji" draggable="false" alt="😀" src="/img/36x36/1f600.png"> ccc <img class="emoji" draggable="false" alt="🐈" src="/img/36x36/1f408.png"> ddd</p>
.


Unknown name
.
💩 :qwerty:
.
<p><img class="emoji" draggable="false" alt="💩" src="/img/36x36/1f4a9.png"> :qwerty:</p>
.
